ya10.2.1:2.1: acakkhukānaṃ → acakkhukānaṃ itthīnaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | sacakkhukānaṃ → sacakkhukānaṃ itthīnaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Sacakkhukānaṃ → itaresaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:28.1: ahetukānaṃ → vinā saddhāya (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | sahetukānaṃ → saddhāya (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:32.1: ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ → vinā ñāṇena (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ → ñāṇena (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:115.1: somanassavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ → nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:158.1: Sacittakānaṃ ahetukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ → sacittakānaṃ vinā saddhāya upapajjantānaṃ (cck); sacittakānaṃ vinā saddhāya uppajjantānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1) | Sahetukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ → saddhāya upapajjantānaṃ (cck); saddhāya uppajjantānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:161.1: Sacittakānaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ → sacittakānaṃ vinā ñāṇena upapajjantānaṃ (cck); sacittakānaṃ vinā ñāṇena uppajjantānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:185.1: arūpāvacare → idaṃ padaṃ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:26.1: Upekkhāya → vinā somanassena upekkhāya (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | upapajjantānaṃ pavatte upekkhāsampayuttacittassa → somanassavippayuttaupekkhāsampayuttacittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:172.1: Asaññasatte arūpe → arūpe asaññasatte (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Pañcavokāre → idaṃ padaṃ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:14.1: purisānaṃ → etthantare pāṭho si, cck, sya1ed potthakesu
ya10.2.1:56.1: Upekkhāya → vinā somanassena upekkhāya (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | upapajjantānaṃ pavatte upekkhāsampayuttacittassa → somanassavippayuttaupekkhāsampayuttacittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1068.1: eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā → etthantare pāṭho cck, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu | eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti → dassetvā kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1080.1: somanassena upapajjitvā → etthantare pāṭho cck, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
ya10.2.1:210.1: Asaññasatte → arūpe asaññasatte (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1) | Catuvokāre → idaṃ padaṃ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:1139.1: Yassa cittassa → catuvokāre pañcavokāre yassa cittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1142.1: Yassa cittassa → pañcavokāre yassa cittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1324.1: parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ ghānindriyañca → cavantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānindriyañca (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:863.1: Asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ → arūpānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ (cck) | Pacchimabhavikānaṃ → catuvokāre pañcavokāre pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ (cck); catuvokāre pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1478.1: Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ → pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ arūpānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:904.1: Asaññasattānaṃ → yassa cittassa anantarā pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati asaññasattānaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:19.1: Sacakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ → pañcavokāraṃ upapajjantānaṃ (cck); pañcavokāraṃ uppajjitthāti (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1651.1: Rūpāvacaraṃ → sacakkhukānaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | kāmāvacaraṃ → saghānakānaṃ (si, cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1575.1: Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ → pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ya10.2.1:1718.1: Suddhāvāsānaṃ upapatticittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ → suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ (cck), suddāvāsaṃ uppajjantānaṃ asaññasattaṃ uppajjantānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed) | pañcavokāraṃ → sacakkhukānaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1856.1: parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjati → pacchimabhavikānaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ uppajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ uppajjati (pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1071.1: itthiyo → idaṃ padaṃ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:1953.1: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ → pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:1720.1: pañcavokāraṃ → sacakkhukānaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ → tesaṃ sacakkhukānaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:165.1: Kāmāvacare → idaṃ padaṃ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:517.1: Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe → vinā somanassena uppajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe (cck, pts-vp-pli1ed) | . Somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā somanassasampayuttapacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ somanassindriyañca na uppajjati upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati → pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ somanassindriyañca (cck, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ya10.2.1:1957.1: Somanassasampayuttapacchimacittassa → pacchimacittassa (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā somanassasampayuttapacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittassa → upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe (cck, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ya10.2.1:387.1: Sabbesaṃ → pañcavokārā (cck, pts-vp-pli1) | acakkhukānaṃ → acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ (si, cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:401.1: cavantānaṃ na purisānaṃ → cavatānaṃ purisānaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
ya10.2.1:41.1: saghānakā → idaṃ padaṃ cck, pts-vp-pli1 potthakesu
ya10.2.1:2530.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjittha → pañcavokāre pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ asaññasattānaṃ ye ca upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ tattha jīvitindriyaṃ uppajjittha (cck, pts-vp-pli1)
